title: "WTP - GLMER w/ PCA"
output: html_document
date: "2022-08-12"

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
#set working directory

data <- read.csv(file = '/Users/melanieruiz/Google Drive/My Drive/WTP_data/PCA/WTP_LONG_wPCA.csv')

# load LMER libraries
library(lme4)
library(lmerTest)
```

## PCs
```{r PC1}
# PC1 GLMER model in R
PC1<-glmer('exp_chosen ~ PC1  + (1|subid)', data=data, family = binomial)
summary(PC1)
```


```{r PC1 + PC2}
# PC1/PC2 GLMER model in R
PC1_2<-glmer('exp_chosen ~ PC1 + PC2 + (1|subid)', data=data, family = binomial)
summary(PC1_2)

```


```{r PC1+ PC2+ PC3}
# PC1/PC2/PC3 GLMER model in R
PC1_2_3<-glmer('exp_chosen ~ PC1 + PC2 + PC3 + (1|subid)', data=data, family = binomial)
summary(PC1_2_3)

```
